2025-05-14.title: Alphabet analyst says ‘complete breakup’ needed for stock gains
2025-05-14.description: The Google parent's companies such as Youtube and Waymo could be 'worth more in pieces than together,' analysts say. Find out more

2025-05-02.title: U.S. to demand Google break up its online advertising business
2025-05-02.description: The DoJ is asking a judge to force Google parent Alphabet to sell its ad exchange and publisher server tech after a trial victory. Read more

2025-05-09.title: Alphabet shares take US$120 billion blow as search warnings blare
2025-05-09.description: Alphabet is on pace for a weekly decline of about six per cent and US$120 billion drop in market value. Find out more.
